com.yelllabs.soapy.json
[Groovy] Class JSONHandler

java.lang.Object
  com.yelllabs.soapy.json.JSONHandler

class JSONHandler
extends java.lang.Object

brief:
A helper class to parse JSON responses. JSON-simple lib is user to parse the actual JSON text
created:
2011-12-22
Authors:
Janusz Kowalczyk

Parameters:

Returns:

hasEmptyValues

boolean hasEmptyValues(java.lang.String key, java.lang.Object val)
brief:
Iterates through the given JSON object and checks if any of the values are empty
Parameters:
key - value, object or array name
val - any JSON value, that can be represented as value, object or array. For more info go to: http://tests.json.org/
Returns:
true when the is at least one empty value, false when no empty value was found

parse

java.lang.Object parse(java.lang.String jsonText)
brief:
a JSON-simple parser's wrapper.
Parameters:
jsonText - any JSON string.
Returns:
If exception was found then JSON.INVALID enum is returned;

parseTestStepResponse

java.lang.Object parseTestStepResponse(java.lang.Object testRunner, java.lang.String testStepName)
brief:
A helper method to parse the response for a certain test step
Parameters:
testRunner - SoapUI's testRunner object;
testStepName - test step name
Returns:
JSON parsed object. Can return JSON.INVALID enum if parsing failed!!!
